headline: FirstEnergy Electric Companies Offer Tips to Stay Safe and Save Energy During Extreme Cold
summary: AKRON, Ohio -- As frigid weather grips the region, FirstEnergy Corp. electric companies remind customers of steps they can take to stay safe and better manage energy bills that may climb due to the...
